Class ClientProxy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.ingsw2024polellipozziquartieritessera.network.server.ClientProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualView, Remote
public class ClientProxy extends Object implements VirtualView
Class that resides in the server and handles message from the server to the clients
